extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).

basic.description: A consideration of the main types of war theory, including descriptive, legal, normative, causal, process, and consequential, with applications to selected case studies.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: The Politics of War
